bibl.title: Greek and Latin Letters. An Anthology, with Translation. (Cambridge Greek and Latin Classics.)
bibl.note: Voir en part. pp. 6-11: The letters from papyrus, wood, lead and stone. - The anthology includes 13 letters on papyri and tablets.
bibl.seg: TRAPP Michael (Edited by), Greek and Latin Letters. An Anthology, with Translation. (Cambridge Greek and Latin Classics.)
Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 2003, 8°, x-348 pp., 1 carte. ISBN 0-521-49597-0 (hbk) / 0-521-49943-7 (pbk). £47.50 (hbk) / £17.95 (pbk).
Voir en part. pp. 6-11: The letters from papyrus, wood, lead and stone. - The anthology includes 13 letters on papyri and tablets.
